other_tests.findings: No oligoclonal bands or malignant cells; cultures of cerebrospinal fluid and blood negative for infectious agents.
Superficial and deep lymphocytic infiltrate, perineural inflammation, mucin deposition, and lymphocytic vasculitis.
Diffuse slowing of delta and theta waves with no spikes or sharp-wave activity.
Fibrotic leptomeninges with inflammatory infiltration, perivascular inflammation, and small focus of white-matter necrosis.
